thread.title: Rio Boss Sam Walsh Says No Interest in Bidding for Glencore
thread.title_full: Rio Boss Sam Walsh Says No Interest in Bidding for Glencore - WSJ

author: Scott Patterson
title: Rio Boss Sam Walsh Says No Interest in Bidding for Glencore
text:
LONDON—Rio Tinto PLC Chief Executive Sam Walsh said he isn’t interested in making a bid for Glencore PLC despite the sharp decline in the embattled Swiss miner’s stock in the past few months.
Mr. Walsh said in an interview Tuesday that he doesn’t think...
